title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, February 20, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of Richard Matheson (1926), writer of science fiction, fantasy, and horror novels and television. His work influenced and inspired writers such as Anne Rice and Stephen King.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
